description: In which the author attends a 2-day, 5-game Blood Bowl tournament in ~~Orlando~~ Celebration, FL, and stumbles into two more tournaments while he's there.
title: The Marquis’ Road to Athel Loren: Three Kingdoms Challenge, Part 1

description: This week’s Hammer of Math gets stuck in with the Boyz and looks at how difficult it is to kill a unit of Ork Boyz in a Green Tide when they’re led by a Painboy. Orks is best. That is indisputable, because Orks can never be beaten. If they win, they win. If they die, […]
title: Hammer of Math: Green Tide Boyz Resiliency

description: THE BROS ARE BACK and they're not alone. See which innocent souls they've dragged into the foolishness of Necbromunda.
title: Battle Bros Season Four, Chapter V: The War for Winkie World

description: Games Workshop confirmed what we suspected: That Dallas will mark the big reveal of the new launch box. There should be a few key models but I’m most looking forward to seeing what is being previewed for Spearhead. We know that this is going to be the first chance for the general public to check […]
title: Age of Sigmar Fourth Edition Explained – May 13th

description: Welcome to the next in our series exploring Bushido Risen Sun. These “Getting Started” articles are meant to help new and (maybe) more experienced players by bringing together an assessment of some of the different profiles, examples of paint jobs and some list examples and reflections from competitive players. Where it exists, we’ll also do […]
title: Bushido Risen Sun: Getting Started with the Minimoto Clan

description: Tom is joined by Ed, Jack and Rob to throw their worst offenders of 40k into Room 101, never to return! All our handy social links: https://linktr.ee/6plusplusgaming
title: That 6+++ Show Episode 87: Room 101 40k Units Edition.=
